meanings.sent1: The misbeginning of the race caused confusion among the participants.
meanings.sent2: The misbeginning of the story made it hard to follow.
meanings.sent3: The misbeginning of the magic show led to unexpected results.
meanings.sent4: The misbeginning of the project set a negative tone for the entire team.
meanings.sent5: The misbeginning of the concert left the audience disappointed.

meanings.definition: To begin in a faulty or incorrect manner.
meanings.sent1: She misbegan her speech by forgetting to introduce herself.
meanings.sent2: They misbeginning their journey by going in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent3: He misbegins every morning by hitting the snooze button too many times.
meanings.sent4: The chef misbeginning the recipe by adding salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent5: The team misbeginning the game with a penalty, putting them at a disadvantage.
